beer.beer_description:
Cask ABV: 4.4%. Bottle ABV: 4.8%.
Juicy, exciting fruit flavours before an intense bitterness as sharp as a Macaw’s screech.

Hopped with: Summit and Amarillo.

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 1 year on Untappd!

items.badge_description: Dispensed traditionally by hand pump, cask beers are best served at 55°F. This temperature allows all of the flavor nuances to emerge and permits appreciation of the often unfiltered texture. That's 140 checkins with the serving style of Cask! Try 5 more for Level 29!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 5 distinct venues!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 5 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 5 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 2.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 5 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 2!
